title: [DOC] Fix warnings of syntax errors and more when building docs
body:
#### Describe the issue linked to the documentation
When doing `make html` from docs folder and building locally, I get many warnings of potentially syntax errors that potentially also cause issues in displaying the docs properly in html on the website.
Example warnings:
```

WARNING: [numpydoc] Validation warnings while processing docstring for 'sktime.transformations.series.window_summarizer.WindowSummarizer':
  GL01: Docstring text (summary) should start in the line immediately after the opening quotes (not in the same line, or leaving a blank line in between)    
  GL03: Double line break found; please use only one blank line to separate sections or paragraphs, and do not leave blank lines at the end of docstrings    
  PR01: Parameters {'target_cols', 'lag_config', 'truncate'} not documented
  PR02: Unknown parameters {'optional (default = dict containing first lag)', 'target_cols: list of str', 'lag_config: dict of str and list', 'optional (default = None)'}
  PR10: Parameter "target_cols" requires a space before the colon separating the parameter name and type
  PR09: Parameter "target_cols: list of str" description should finish with "."
  PR04: Parameter "optional (default = None)" has no type
  PR09: Parameter "optional (default = None)" description should finish with "."
  PR10: Parameter "lag_config" requires a space before the colon separating the parameter name and type
  PR04: Parameter "optional (default = dict containing first lag)" has no type
  SA01: See Also section not found
```
#### Suggest a potential alternative/fix
One would have to go through this warnings and fix the mostly small syntactical issues in the files directly. After fixing all warnings, we could probably also change the setting in the `.readthedocs.yml` to fail as soon as there is a warning, so we can avoid introducing warnings in future:
```sphinx:
  configuration: docs/source/conf.py
#  fail_on_warning: True
```
Currently, this is commented out.
